## Corporate Event Photographer

Phoenix, AZ | Scottsdale, AZ | Las Vegas, NV

We’ve been published in The Wallstreet Journal, O, The Oprah Magazine, and
have been endorsed by Pointe Hilton Tapatio Hilton Resorts located in Phoenix,
Arizona. Tavits Photography won Best Nightlife Photographer by Arizona
Foothills Magazine and is 100% 5 star rated by our clients.

Corporate Events

All Photography

### Professional Event Photography Team

#### We are a multi-discipline group of commercial photographers with an
extensive network of the finest talent, allowing us to build the perfect team
to bring your vision to life.

TavitPhotographer

I picked up my first camera in 2007 before visiting my mother in France.
During that trip, I fell in love with the craft and knew this was what I would
be doing for the rest of my life. Since that time, I have sought out like
minded individuals that never settle for less and strive to become better in
their craft. Headshots, corporate events, and parties would be my primary
photography specialties’. Besides taking pictures, I enjoy hiking, going to
comedy shows, attending music festivals, and being with my wife, daughter and
2 dogs. I’m still searching for the perfect cup of coffee which corresponds
with my passion to travel.

GwendolynPhotographer

It was dusk on the edge of the Grand Canyon’s north rim. Summer of 2000. I’d
just earned my bachelor’s in photography from ASU. Sitting on the rock ledge,
an event producer friend turned to me and asked “Gwendolyn, would you shoot a
sales meeting next month in Boca Raton?” That’s how it all began for me. Fast
forward 22 years, and I’m still hooked on creating compelling imagery for
corporate clients. It’s my passion!

  

AaronPhotographer

Aaron attended ASU’s Walter Cronkite School of Journalism and Mass
Communication where he fully realized his passion for photography. He has been
practicing photography since 2008 and shooting professionally since 2015. His
work specializes in marketing and corporate events, lifestyle, nightlife, and
residential and commercial real estate, frequently working with brands such as
Moët Hennessy. In his spare time, Aaron enjoys traveling, video games, music,
and film.

JacobPhotographer

Jacob started his professional career in 2013 but was into the art of
photography as a young child. Now currently a published & traveling
photographer based out of Phoenix; he works across the valley and country for
various events such as corporate conferences, music festivals, and
photojournalism assignments. Being diverse in many aspects of photography
really makes him stand apart in the industry. He has been a longtime friend &
colleague of Tavit, helping provide clients with exceptional content and
quality service.

JaronPHOTOGRAPHER

I was born and raised in Waipahu, Hawaii. I have been in the East Valley,
Arizona for over ten years now and have been shooting music, nightlife and
events for 4 years. When I am not shooting, I enjoy exploring the outdoors,
trying out new restaurants, and spending time with loved ones.

LuisPhotographer

Luis Colato found his passion for photography in high school, and shortly
after graduating decided to pursue a Bachelors Degree in Digital Photography
at Arizona State University. At the young age of 18, Luis started his
professional photography career in the live music industry, working on media
teams of various music festivals within the valley. The skills and connections
gained from working these events helped Luis expand his work to also include
Nightclubs, Weddings, Corporate Events, Portraiture, Real-estate among many
other specialties. While still relatively young, Luis has grown to become a
very well-rounded photographer; His work could be described as sharp and
vibrant, yet true to life.

PeterPHOTOGRAPHER

Peter’s degree is in Visual Communication and has always had a passion for
taking photos all his life. In 2011 is when it all started shooting nightlife.
Over the years this allowed him to hone his photo skills of shooting in low
light and mastering the speedlight. Over the past 10 years he’s broadened his
abilities and skills covering sponsored corporate events, weddings, bar/bat
mitzvah’s, photo shoots, and food/menu items plus festivals. Clients include W
Hotel, New Times, Van Gogh Phoenix to Relentless Beats among countless others.

LydiaHair and Makeup

Hi, I’m Lydia, and I have been a licensed professional hairstylist and makeup
artist since 2007. I am so grateful to have a career that I love and continue
to grow in. When you look good, you feel good, and it’s that kind of happiness
that I try to give to others every time I provide a service. Whether it’s for
a wedding, photoshoot, or conference, I can customize looks ranging from glam
to minimal everyday looks. I love connecting with my clients on both a
personal and professional level to grow my relationships. When I’m not
working, I love to attend concerts, festivals and comedy shows with my husband
or stay home with our amazing baby girl Lula.

__1173 Corporate Events

 __65 Years Combined Experience

 __89 Event Photography

# Hire Us

Let’s talk about your project.

Tavits Photography specializes in commercial photography including event
photography, business headshots, advertising photography, corporate event
photography, and videography including 360˚ photos and videos.

Learn more about the services offered by Tavits Photography. For special
projects, contact us.

Pricing & ServicesContact Us

### Corporate Event Photographer Reviews

★★★★★ a year ago

Tavit is amazing! He has worked on our 600 person conference plus networking
receptions for the past two years and was able to capture everything I asked
and then some. Everyone could not stop raving about his work – the pictures
come out fantastic. I hire photographers for a number of events in different
cities throughout the year and Tavit is by far my favorite. I highly recommend
him for any photography needs, especially a corporate event. We will
definitely use him if again next year!

Jill Kirkpatrick - Corporate Event Photography

★★★★★ 2 years ago

I am the Marketing Director for the company, Riot Hospitality Group. We own
and operate multiple restaurant, bars and nightclubs in AZ and Chicago
currently. Tavit has taken nightlife and food photos for us and I just want to
say that he is hands down one of the best in the business! I have worked with
him for over 5 years now and can always expect top quality content within a 24
hour turn around. Keep it up bud!

Sean Frantz - Commercial Photography

★★★★★ 2 years ago

Tavit is a true master at what he does. I use him more than once a month for
private event photography and I am always impressed. No matter the setting,
lighting, or other challenges the pictures always turn out fantastic. He is
professional, prompt and caters his service to each individual client’s needs.
I highly recommend his services.

Ryan Smith - Event Photography

★★★★★ a year ago

When we first met Tavit, we were immediately drawn to his passion, creativity,
drive and his true love for photography. The photos he showed us, we so full
of life, color and beauty and that was exactly what we wanted for our day. We
had booked him right away knowing he would be the perfect person, I’d prefer
to call him an artist, to help capture our wedding day! We took him to our
venue and we could see his excitement and the wheels spinning in his head for
fun and unique photo ideas that are definitely outside the cookie cutter
wedding box which in the end, had no idea he would actually bring those ideas
to life. He is professional, patient, creative, encouraging and very
comfortable to work with. If something didn’t work, he would make a change and
poof…magic!! He was with us from our first look until the very last minute of
the wedding…and I gotta be honest, I didn’t even know he caught the moments he
did because he is like a ninja!! I could not have imagined how PERFECT our
wedding album is…every picture was more beautiful than the next that they
honestly bring tears to my eyes, seriously. When you think of capturing your
wedding day, knowing you won’t see every moment happening, it was so great to
see that Tavit took the time to photograph every single guest and all the
details that you tend to forget because as the couple you are wrapped up in
the day. I could not be more thankful for him.

Ryan Schmidt - Event Photography

★★★★★ 2 years ago

Tavit took photos at my bridal shower and I loved everyone of them! He was so
professional the entire time and was always on top of everything. He is also a
really cool guy which makes him fun to be around. I would HIGHLY recommend him
for any event!

Misty Myre - Event Photography

★★★★★ a year ago

Tavit is hands down one of the best photographers to work with in Arizona. He
takes great pride in his craft and his work speaks for itself. Very
professional and an absolute pleasure to work with!

Scott Wolf - Corporate Event Photography

★★★★★ a year ago

Tavit was extremely professional and punctual. It was my first time being part
of a photo shoot. He made the experience comfortable and fun. The photos he
took are top notch. I was very happy with his work and would recommend him
highly to anyone that wants professional photos taken.

Ryan Brooks - Business Headshots
